DataKitDeploymentLog.name: DataKitDeploymentLog
DataKitDeploymentLog.description: Represents the log details of a data kit component deployment. This object is available in API version 61.0 or later.

BundleName.description: Name of the data stream bundle if a data stream is deployed from a data kit.

ComponentName.description: Name of the component thatâ€™s deployed from a data kit.

ComponentTemplateId.description: ID of the data kit template from which the component is deployed. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

ComponentType.description: The type of the component for which the deployment is tracked in the log details.

DataKitName.description: Name of the data kit being deployed.

DataPackageKitDefinition.description: ID of the data kit being deployed. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

DataSpaceName.description: Name of the data space the components are deployed to.

DeploymentAction.description: Deployment action of the data kit components.

DeploymentError.description: Contains the error details if the data kit deployment fails.

DeploymentStatus.description: Deployment status of the data kit components.

FileBasedComponentTemplate.description: ID of the file-based component template that corresponds to the deployment log entry. Available in API version 63.0 and later.

FlowInterviewIdentifier.description: Identifier of the flow interview if the deployment was triggered using a flow.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed the deployment log file.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this deployment log.

Name.description: The name of the deployment log.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user that owns the deployment.

PublisherOrgComponentId.description: The ID of the component in the publisher org.

SubscriberOrgComponentId.description: The ID of the component in the subscriber org in which the components of a data kit are deployed.

TemplateVersion.description: The version of the template from which the deployment was done.
